amendment.description: Amendment provides for placing the text of the bill into Section 14 rather than Section 16 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bachus amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Bachus.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bachus amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
